name: IDC Elevator
overview: IDC Elevator is a four-month-long startup accelerator program. The first three months take place at Elevator’s headquarters, an open loft-like space on 35 Ahad-Ha’am street, corner of Rothschild boulevard, Tel Aviv’s most dynamic and creative urban zone. The fourth month takes place in NYC. IDC Elevator provides mentorship and sponsorship services throughout the program, to improve the companies’ product prototype, positioning, and definition, and to expand the team’s networking ability.
